# PBI #9: Write Comprehensive Unit Tests

**Priority:** High  
**Story Points:** 5  
**Labels:** `testing`, `quality`, `unit-tests`

## Description
Write comprehensive unit tests for all new components.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Unit tests for `GeminiNanoService`
- [ ] Unit tests for `TagSuggestionRepositoryImpl`
- [ ] Unit tests for both use cases
- [ ] Unit tests for updated ViewModels
- [ ] All tests pass in CI/CD
- [ ] Code coverage >80% for new code
- [ ] Tests follow existing patterns

## Dependencies
- Depends on all implementation PBIs (1-8)

See TAG_SUGGESTIONS_IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md for full details.
